testcase.classname: Partner Organization credit request by PM and Approval and CA
testcase.name: Partner Organization creation by PM and Approval by BAM and CA:[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed And I go to Partner Organization Credit Request Page........................passed Then I apply for partner organization credit request........................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Then I launch the application as a CA.......................................passed Then I approve the credit request...........................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed And I verify that the organization credit request is approved...............passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
